Class ServerInfo

java.lang.Object
com.spaceinvaders.backend.firebase.utils.ServerInfo
public class ServerInfo extends Object
ServerInfo.java
The ServerInfo class is responsible for retrieving server configuration and constants (serverInfo, clientConstants) from a Firebase Realtime Database. It uses Firebase's REST API to fetch and parse data dynamically for better scalability.
Since:
11/27/2024
Version:
2.0
Author:
Aryan, Gathik, Abhirath, Ibrahim, Jayant, Dedeepya
